attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the same support as normal workers . many of us are injured and go without pay due to being self employed or employed .we would like to change this and have a designated union, although we get a minimum of £7 per hour we would like to get the 3-5% inflation increase in wages due to the dangerouse job we do. DON'T FORGET WE SUPPORT YOUR POLICE FORCE and we pay the licence fee for the privalage, we would also like to be concidered as a civil servant getting all the benefits.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
